<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/orgs/{orgId}/teams"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new team in the organization identified by the given `orgId`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orgId","in":"path","description":"Organization numeric identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"x-speakeasy-param-optional":false}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Team create request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"team":{"required":["name"],"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","nullable":true,"readOnly":true,"x-speakeasy-param-optional":true,"x-speakeasy-name-override":"teamId"},"name":{"maxLength":40,"pattern":"^[a-zA-Z\\d](?:[a-zA-Z\\d]|[-_](?=[a-zA-Z\\d])){1,38}$","type":"string"},"description":{"maxLength":250,"type":"string"},"dateCreated":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","readOnly":true},"lastUpdated":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","readOnly":true}},"x-speakeasy-entity":"Teams","title":"Team"},"avatarId":{"type":"string"}},"title":"CreateTeamRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
